name: Night Magic
summary: You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood.
description:
You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood. You gain animal form (wolf only, using the statistics for a canine) and obscuring mist as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
